basics.name: Anıl Can Baykal
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software engineer with production-proven experience in development of Mobile applications & backends on different platforms. Built small/mid sized software teams, managed using agile methods and delivered solid projects.

work.summary: Co-founded and developed Turkey's first mobile payment platform, Ödeal İşyerim. Ödeal İşyerim allows registered businesses to accept credit card payments with the free app without having any hidden costs. Built the payment system using Google App Engine & Amazon Web Services and mvp mobile applications. Currently recruiting a small team and leading the development on iOS application
highlights: Received the highest first round investment in Turkey [http://webrazzi.com/2015/03/11/sanko-online-mobil-odeme-sistemi-odeal-yatirim/]

work.summary: Joined Mobilike, one of the leading Mobile Advertising Company in Turkey, as the Lead Software Engineerfor they manage 80+ mobile applications developed by various 3rd parties.Coordinated the development/integration process and also developed an advertising and analytics SDK, Makina (later rebranded to 'seamless'). After working with many 3rd party applications, developed  SaaS framework Handsome (similar to Parse) which solves common problems in mobile application development. A new company called `Nomad Commerce` was created  which is focued on building Hansome backed-up mobile applications. Recruited and lead a small team of software developers who successfully developed two commercial applications (Yellow Medya and Cobone) on three platforms (iOS, Android, WinPhone) and a quiz application(Know now!) using Handsome framework
highlights: Makina ad framework -- later renamed to `seamless` [http://goseamless.com]
Handsome Framework -- later open sourced under the name Lembas and as a commercial product Cortex [http://nomadcommerce.com/#cortex]

work.summary: Hired as developer #2 at Pozitron and worked on the inhouse J2ME framework which -still- empowers İşCep, Bilyoner on low end devices. Developed server side development with a project that provisions and distribution of mobile applications to java based devices. Moved to iOS platform development in 2008 and published first mobile banking application IsCep . With the growth at Pozitron, became the Lead Developer in most the projects (Biletix, Bilyoner, Thy..) and continued developing for iOS (ProDG, Finanscep). Responsabilities also included recruting, software architecture for clients and inhouse framework research&evelopment.
highlights: İşCep iPhone app for Is Bankasi, Turkey's biggest bank
THY iPhone app for Turkish Airlines
Biletix iPhone app for Ticketmaster Turkey
Bilyoner iPhone app  for Bilyoner, Turkey's biggest betting site
ProDG iPhone app for GlaxoSmithKline Turkey

work.summary: Started as an intern at Sednacom and became a junior software developer. Worked with Python and contributed to ongoing TinyERP (Odoo) projects by developing submodules for different clients.
Over the years, I have work on many successful project as a freelance contractor

publications.name: Happy-download
publications.summary: Multi threaded file download with ASIHTTPRequest

publications.name: Lembas Mobile Framework
publications.summary: A mobile framework to easily build iOS/Android applications with server and client libraries

awards.title: Applications and Interactive Media/Sales Category
